title: BUG Clipping by Region for PDF Creation
body:
**Description**

Clipping by path via SkRegion fails for PDF creation

**Code**

Clipping is done 

`	var clipPath = new SKPath();
	clipPath.AddCircle(100, 100, 50);
	canvas.ClipRegion(new SKRegion(clipPath));`

https://gist.github.com/WinstonSmith77/204eb0316b19ad2a2403205d2940647a


**Expected Behavior**

Correct clipping by path

**Actual Behavior**

Clipping by bounding box of region is applied

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue: 2.80.3


- Platform Target Frameworks 
** .net Core on Windows

  **Screenshots**

Bitmap is fine: Clipping by circle

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2392406/147108924-0035fc1f-813e-4619-9c98-349e6a3463f5.png)

PDF is wrong: Bounding Box of circle

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2392406/147108783-88123045-40b1-44f4-bc69-20838e61a212.png)




<!-- if the issue is a visual issue, please include screenshots showing the problem if possible -->

**Reproduction Link**

https://gist.github.com/WinstonSmith77/204eb0316b19ad2a2403205d2940647a
